key.name: hide-a11y-icon
key.description: Hide a11y icon from the panel

key.name: default-scale-factor
key.description: Scale factor to restore if extension is disabled or unknown configuration

key.name: integrate-dash-to-dock
key.description: Optional field. Enables Dash To Dock integration

key.name: default-dash-to-dock-icon-size
key.summary: Default icon size for the Dash To Dock extension
key.description: Optional field. Defaults to this icon size for the Dash To Dock extension if not specified elsewhere
